about.description: I'm a 23 years old frontend developer very passionate and eager to learn. My goal is to learn as much as I can to become my better version as a developer. I'm a proactive and empathetic person. Also a team player with great communication and listening skills. I feel motivated to learn, grow and develop my career in this fascinating area with a group of people full of empathy, good communication, and synergy.
about.name: Name: Pablo Rodriguez
